generic.industries_subtitle: I nostri clienti operano nei seguenti settori di attività:

services_page.materials_subtitle: Possiamo lavorare materiali che rientrano nelle seguenti categorie:

CNC_Turning.title: CNC Automatic Turning
CNC_Turning.description: CNC turning is one of the central methods of manufacturing. It can produce cylindrical parts with various contours.

CNC_Milling.title: CNC Automatic Milling
CNC_Milling.description: Known for its accuracy and precision, the process is an integral part of several industries, most notable being automotive and aeronautics.

CNC_Threading.title: CNC Automatic Threading
CNC_Threading.description: Threaded parts are a fundamental metalwork process. Our CNC lathes are capable of turning internal, external, standard and special threads.

CNC_Broaching.title: CNC Automatic Broaching
CNC_Broaching.description: Broaching is a machining process where a sharp, hardened, toothed tool removes material from a workpiece in a consistent, continuous, and accurate way.

reworking_pressed_parts.title: Reworking Stamped Parts
reworking_pressed_parts.description: Using modern CNC lathes, we are capable of reworking stamped metal or injection-moulded plastic.

assemblies.title: Small Assemblies
assemblies.description: Our company has the required resources to assemble small components.
